name: BFR1
site-address: Land adjoining Shermans Oak, Coldharbour Road, Upper Dicker
notes: This site was previously granted outline planning permission under planning reference WD/2015/0854/O on 19/06/2015 and was later approved under a reserved matters application WD/2017/0873/RM on 14/07/2017 that is still extant.. Total of 2 pairs of semi-detached houses, 1 detached house and 1 bungalow
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR2
notes: This site was granted full planning permission under planning reference WD/2014/1177/F on the 15/07/2014 but this is no longer extant.. Total of 5 units comprising of 4 semi-detached houses and one house

name: BFR8
site-address: Land at Heatherlea, Newick Lane, Heathfield
notes: This site was previously granted full planning permission under planning reference WD/2017/0258/F for the demolition of a existing dwelling, annexe, static mobile home, workshops and outbuildings and the erection of a residential development comprising 7 dwellings on 10/06/2017. The site was also granted full planning permission under planning reference WD/2017/2954/F for the demolition of a static mobile home, annexe, workshops and outbuildings, alterations and additions to existing dwelling and erection of resdential development comprising six dwellings on 27/04/2018. The latest planning application refers the latter planning application for six dwellings.. Total of 6 new detached dwellings
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR10

ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR13
notes: This site was previously granted full planning permission under planning reference WD/2015/2220/MAJ for the demolition of a existing nursery school, associated buildings and swimming pool and residential development comprising 9 new dwellings and conversion of existing lodge (total of 10 dwelling units) on 08/03/2016. In addition, the site had an application for a minor material amendment approved on 13/06/2018.. Total of 10 units comprising of one two bedroom, 4 three bedroom, 1 four bedroom and 4 five bedroom houses
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR17
notes: This site was granted full planning permission for 10 (net) dwellings comprising 10 residential flats on 18/05/2017 under reference WD/2017/0323/MAJ that is extant at the time of writing. In addition, under planning reference WD/2019/0073/P01 the Council approved a scheme under the General Permitted Development Order procedure for the conversion of the first and third floors of the building to 7 residential flats.. Total of 7 units comprising of 7 residential apartments
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
